subject: Order #SSN2092 delivery address issue
description_text:
Hi, I've just placed an order with yourself for a shifter and handbrake. I've just noticed the post code doesn't match the address details (my old address postcode)

Just to confirm.

Order - #SSN2092

Delivery address is;

Jamie Martin
121 woodhouse lane
Beighton
Sheffield
S20 1AD
UK

Thanks,

Jamie.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamie Martin,    Okay, we've modified it for you.
